## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 40,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock for the forecasted demand, considering a margin of error and lead time. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Higher than the Player's planned purchase quantity, ensuring enough inventory. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.6 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                    |
| Comments                          | Utilizing the maximum vendor order size ensures meeting forecasted demand and allows for a buffer for unexpected demand fluctuations. |
